posts.title: The Future of Prosthetics in Competitive Running
posts.author: Dr. Sarah Chen
posts.excerpt: How carbon fiber technology is shattering records and redefining human potential in paralympic sports.
posts.content: The landscape of competitive running is undergoing a seismic shift, driven not just by human grit but by groundbreaking advancements in prosthetic technology...

posts.title: Mental Resilience: The Hidden Muscle
posts.author: Mark Johnson
posts.excerpt: Top adaptive athletes share their strategies for overcoming mental barriers and staying focused under pressure.
posts.content: Physical strength will get you to the starting line, but it's mental resilience that gets you across the finish...

about.mission: Our mission is simple: to break down barriers.
